I am a naturally curious person who enjoys creating things and exploring narratives.

Hi, my name is Burak Deniz Koca (I usually prefer Deniz). I am a lifelong learner from Turkey. So far my curiosity has led me to academia, where I earned degrees in English Language and Literature, American Culture and Literature, and Sociology. I recently submitted my MA thesis on "Consumerism and American Identity Crisis in Contemporary American Novels" and am currently studying Latin Language and Literature.

The same curiosity led me to a career in creative media, where I've worked as a video editor, copywriter, and project director. It also led me to dabble in interests from amateur leather crafting to film screenwriting. I was, and still am, fascinated by how any content is shaped by the platform it is produced on.

I'm a bit of a perfectionist (I am trying to be less of one) and can get obsessed about little details. When a workflow is broken, I feel compelled to fix it. This obsession is what has pulled me into the world of programming recently and this site is the home for all my rabbit holes from TTRPG worldbuilding and screenwriting to building web applications from the ground up.
